item.name: [ArangoDB] Client: Bytes Received
item.description: Bytes receiveds for a request.

item.name: [ArangoDB] Client: Bytes Sent
item.description: Bytes sents for a request.

item.name: [ArangoDB] Client: Time I/O
item.description: Request I/O needed to answer a request.

item.name: [ArangoDB] Client: Time Queue
item.description: Queue time needed to answer a request.

item.name: [ArangoDB] Client: Time Request
item.description: Request time needed to answer a request.

item.name: [ArangoDB] Client: Time Total
item.description: Total time needed to answer a request.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests Async
item.description: Number of asynchronously executed HTTP requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests DELETE
item.description: Number of HTTP DELETE requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests GET
item.description: Number of HTTP GET requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests HEAD
item.description: Number of HTTP HEAD requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests OPTIONS
item.description: Number of HTTP OPTIONS requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests Other
item.description: Number of other HTTP requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests PATCH
item.description: Number of HTTP PATCH requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests POST
item.description: Number of HTTP POST requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests PUT
item.description: Number of HTTP PUT requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] HTTP: Requests Total
item.description: Total number of HTTP requests.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: Page Faults Major
item.description: On Windows, this figure contains the total number of page faults. On other system, this figure contains the number of major faults the process has made which have required loading a memory page from disk.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: Page Faults Minor
item.description: The number of minor faults the process has made which have not required loading a memory page from disk. This figure is not reported on Windows.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: Number of Threads
item.description: Number of threads in the arangod process.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: Resident Set Size Percent
item.description: The percentage of physical memory used by the process as resident set size.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: Resident Set Size
item.description: The total size of the number of pages the process has in real memory. This is just the pages which count toward text, data, or stack space. This does not include pages which have not been demand-loaded in, or which are swapped out. The resident set size is reported in bytes.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: System Time
item.description: Amount of time that this process has been scheduled in kernel mode, measured in seconds.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: User Time
item.description: Amount of time that this process has been scheduled in user mode, measured in seconds.

item.name: [ArangoDB] System: Virtual Memory Size
item.description: On Windows, this figure contains the total amount of memory that the memory manager has committed for the arangod process. On other systems, this figure contains The size of the virtual memory the process is using.
